properties.name: Palo Alto Prisma Cloud - High severity alert opened for several days
properties.query:
PaloAltoPrismaCloud
| where Reason =~ 'NEW_ALERT'
| where AlertSeverity =~ 'high'
| where Status =~ 'open'
| extend alert_time = now() - TimeGenerated
| where alert_time > 1d
| extend ['Opened Days'] = strcat('Alert opened for ', strcat(toint(alert_time / 1d), ' days'))
| project AlertMessage, AlertSeverity, ['Opened Days'], ResourceId, UserName
| extend AccountCustomEntity = UserName
properties.description: 'Detects high severity alert which is opened for several days.'
